portfolio.title: E-Learning Platform
portfolio.description: Designing and developing a learning platform with dedicated interfaces for both students and teachers. Utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, MongoDB, Express.js, and Node.js (MERN stack) for comprehensive functionality and seamless user experience.

portfolio.title: To Do List Interface
portfolio.description: Development of an interface enabling the addition, modification, and deletion of tasks. Utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Redux Toolkit to facilitate efficient task management and seamless user interaction.

portfolio.title: Movie App Interface
portfolio.description: Development of an interface for displaying, filtering, and adding a movie profile. Utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js to create a user-friendly platform for managing movie profiles with ease.
